		getBoost (line 75)
	
 
	
	

Gets the boost for this clause.  Documents matching  this clause will (in addition to the normal weightings) have their score  multiplied by boost.   The boost is 1.0 by default.

	
    
				
  • access: public
    • 
			

	
	

		float
		
			getBoost
		
				()
